content.detailedDescription:
1. driving back from the village of minchinhampton to amberley after eating out on holiday.

2. i noticed a strange movement of light in the sky (was in the middle of nowhere so it stuck out a bit!).

3. at first i thought it was some kind of reflection on the windscreen but it was obvious it was not when my girlfirend said she could see it too. once we realised it was above the cloud level and had observed it's eratic movements we were a bit stunned.

4. the object was a greeny grey colour (obscured by cloud)and resembled a fat rugby ball above the cloud level. it was a cloudy night yet we could see something moving beyond it. it's movements were completely eratic covering vast distances, left right, back and forward. changing direction far too quickly for it to be any kind of human craft. there didn't appear to be any noise (although we were inside the car travelling at the time). it was quite large as we could see it without looking hard and it was well up in the sky.

5. at first i was a bit confused as i tried to think of a logical answer for what it could be. i was still driving so asked my girlfriend to have a look. she wasn't sure either and then confusion turned to a little fear. both a little freaked out being in the sticks and something strange above us. it was only a short distance back to the hotel and we had our eye on it all the way. when we reached the hotel we got out of the car and looked to the sky but whatever it was had gone. we probable saw it for approximately 2 minutes.

6. we lost eye contact when we got out of the car and when we looked again it had gone.

no piccies i'm afraid. only had a camera phone with us but were too stunned to think about taking pictures (and possibly a little scared to keep looking at it).
content.summary: Greeny grey, fat rugby ball like shape, eratic movements above cloud level, covering vast distance in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on highway 13 coming back from dickson tn.
there was a bright flash of light to my left and when i looked up i saw the round shaped objects moving rapidly.
they were beaming light to the ground in front of them.
it was really bright.
they looked fuzzy and could not focus on therm clearly.
they then shot up in went out of sight.
content.summary: Two objects streaked accross the sky from south to north hitting the earth to the north with lights

content.detailedDescription: We were out bike riding when my friends 10 year old daughter noticed an object sitting under the clouds blinking.At first we thought it was a bird riding the air currents,then we noticed that this object was blinking .The object then staerted moving in a north easterly direction in the sky when all of a sudden another object popped out of the clouds and started blinking just like the first object we noticed.This second object then moved towards the first one we spotted and caught up to the first object with the blinking light and then they both shot into the clouds.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A friend of mine and his daughter witnessed a craft come down in the city of winnipeg.
I saw 3 lights in the western sky 2 moved and vanished went inside and huge noise outside on porch no one there my dog barking in back

content.detailedDescription: I was outside at night, with 9 friends and family, ages 18-55, around a pit fire when i noticed a small white ball of light floating across the sky. at first i thought it was a white balloon, so i disregarded it, until i saw a second one follow it, about 5-10 seconds apart. it was in same shape, appearance, and speed as the first one. then there appeared a third object, same as the first two. it had a smaller pinpoint of light trailing it and then another white ball of light closely following it. there were 30+ objects seen over a span of twenty minutes. the intervals of seperation were anywhere from several seconds to a minute. they all traveled in the same direction across the same path in the sky.The lights were traveling from northwest to southeast and seemed to be at high altitude. there was a full moon out and a clear sky.  the lights were not planes because there were planes in the area at the same time as the lights, which had no flashing lights on them. in fact, one of the lights actually crossed the path of a plane, the object flying over it. one of the objects that flew by halfway through the event appeared lower in altitude or bigger in size because it was observed to be rotating as it flew through the sky. there was a black spot that could be seen on it. the area in which the objects flew is residential and very well lit with street lighting and the sky has the soft glow of the city of chicago lights illuminating it. there was no mistaking the lights for planes, helicopters, balloons, or any thing else except for silent, fast moving white lights. the police were contacted but a cruiser came about five mins. after the last light flew by so no official sighting was taken. there was an air and water show earlier that day on the chicago lakefront the cop told us, so he said the craft might have been military. however, the lights were seen flying extremely close to commercial airliners (our area is in a holding pattern for chicago midway airport) and the nighttime nature of the event left his explanation suspect. we tried recording the lights with a camcorder, but they could not be see through the view finder. through binoculars, the lights appeared to be triangular/oblong shaped, except for the large one seen; it had a pear/dumbbell shape. we lost sight of the objetc because of trees. if there was any other report of this sighting, could you please let me know.
content.summary: Small white ball of light floating across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
The following report is from notes made shortly after the events. the notes/incidents cited were previously submitted to the old nicap organization back in the 1960s. fyi
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

i was waiting for the high school bus the first time i saw it. i was outside, facing west. suddenly, i noticed a small object about 15 degrees above the horizon, shaped like a tear drop on its side, the large end appearing to be the nose of it as it led the in the direction of travel. it was of a silvery luster and heading slowly in a northwesterly direction in what seemed a deliberate manner like an aircraft might. i have no idea the distance but its apparent size was about the size of a large pin head held at arm's length. i was able to watch it for about 15 minutes as it slowly moved south to north until it disappeared behind some obscuring trees.

later that same day, at about 4 pm, i was riding a bicycle home from a friend's when i once again saw the same object, at about the same size and sitting quite still in a north westerly position at about the same elevation as in the morning. i could not keep my eyes on it all the time while riding the bike and within just a few minutes, it suddenly vanished and i never saw it again.  

key things which made it seem odd to me were that it had this teardrop on its side shape with no apparent wings, stabilizers or any other appendages.  no smoke, no flashes of light, and no noise.  also, during the second sighting, it held absolutely still in relation to the ground and other objects in my line of sight, yet the wind was blowing pretty hard and obviously making the trees at ground level move. that made me think it was some sort of controlled aircraft or something not at the whim of the winds.  i had seen previously war surplus barrage balloons and weather balloons and this did not bounce around in the wind like they would have.

however, probably the most remarkable thing about these two sightings was that as you looked at this object, it seemed to always have the same silvery luster to it. i have compared its color and sheen to that which a new nickel has.  

the truly odd part is that it looked no different to me when the sun shone on it from the east in the morning, than it appeared to me in the afternoon with the late afternoon sun shining on it from the west.  in the morning, i would have expected it to be bright and shiny because i was between the sun and it.  in the afternoon, however, it was between myself and the sun and the side i saw should have been in shadow and relatively less bright, but it did not seem so. i don't know if that indicates an innate luminosity, but regardless, it seemed a bit different than what i had observed watching aluminum skinned aircraft in similar lighting situations.
content.summary: Two sightings of teardrop shaped silvery object at different times of day, same day.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my house and sitting outside. i was looking at the stars when i saw the ufo. i was just staring at it. it started moving down in a 'z' form and it then appered to be gone then there was a bright light then it shoot acrose the sky. i felt terafied at first then awed by it. no, i didn't lose sit of it.
content.summary: Bright lights and very fast

content.detailedDescription: (1)-i was outside in my backyard one september 2003 evening about10 pm setting up my telescope to view stars to the south.  a few street lights and commercial signs were lit up nearby, but stars could still be seen.(2)-as i was setting up my telescope i was facing due south, i noticed movment to my left or east through my side vision, i immediatly turned and saw the craft.(3)-i thought the object was a ufo "flying saucer". (4)-the object was disc shaped, about 50 feet in diamter, moving about 30 mph due south,  no lights, no sound, no exhuast, no wings. it had some type of hatch on top of it and a white circle on the bottom outter edge of the craft. it passed above the live oak tree in my back yard. i am estimating it was 200-300 feet distance from me. (5) i was excited but yet very perplexed as to what it was, who built it, why it was flying in my neighborhood, and how did it stay up without making a sound? i told some of my family members and some friends, i also sent a report to nuforc website. an astonomer at seti recommed that i also give mufon a report of this sighting. (6)i lost sighting of this objcet as it passed beyond my neighbors trees, that were and are still to my immediate south.
content.summary: A disc shaped object observed by me, at night, moving about 30mph, about 50 feet in diameter
3 cylinders that appear to be divided by a black stripeheading south then turning west

content.detailedDescription: Please see investigator's log below.
content.summary: Close sighting, probable abduction

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work, approaching the intersection of stresemann street and governor drive.  i then saw a greenish hue from the driver-side window, which is quite an odd sight when, due to cloud cover and marine layer, the sky is usually sodium-yellow in hue.  as i made my left turn onto stresemann, and approached my house, i saw the green flare-like object slowly descending over what appeared to be a block not too far from where i lived.  it was close enough for me to be worried something might catch fire if it touched any foliage, but it itself was not very large at all.  i'd wager, at arms-length, it was roughly the size of a bb.  yet, it was bright enough to be highly specular, to have extensive glare surrounding it, and was bright enough to leave dim, yet sharply defined, shadows on the ground.  as i was driving at the time, i cannot tell if it had any sound.

at the time i saw it, the first thing that raced through my mind was a meteorite that was composed largely of copper or one of its oxides.  however, it was moving entirely too slowly for that to be the case; an object of the size i saw, moving fast enough to flouresce at that luminosity, would transcend the sky as fast as any other meteor you see in the sky -- less than two seconds to cover an entire great circle overhead.  this was just kind of floating down lazily, as if it didn't have a care in the world.

since the only thing i knew that was that bright and moved that slowly was something lightweight that was on fire, i was absolutely certain it was a flare of some kind, hence i never reported it.  sea world is known to have nightly fireworks displays, and that night was no exception.  however, i thought it odd that a green flare would make its way, at full luminosity, all the way from sea world to my city block, complete and through the marine layer clouds (remember -- they're dense water vapor clouds!), intact.  even on a clear night, it is not possible to see sea world's fireworks displays from my house; only to hear them.  i asked my roommates if they had seen anything or if they heard local people launching bottle rockets, but nobody took notice as they were busy doing other things inside the house at the time.  so, i just forgot all about it, confident it was just a spurious flare.

it wasn't until i saw this report <http://gamehippo.Com/cgi-bin/mufon/manage_sighting_reports.Pl?Mode=view_long_desc&id=3663> that i decided to file my report, as she describes an object *exactly* like what i saw: green, highly specular, descending slowly, in a southernly direction, and of a brief duration.  i feel this was the same object, though i don't recall the precise day on which i saw it.  :(

i had no particular reactions except to be extremely curious as to what it was.  i was still driving at the time, so i didn't have much time to get excited and still be safe.

the object disappeared just above the roof of my house.  note that the object did not visibly go behind the house -- it simply expired like a flare would expire, but without the flickering.  that is, in about a quarter of a second, it dimmed and expired just like someone turned off an incadescent light bulb.  it happened too fast to determine if the object spatially receded from me during that time -- again, i was concentrating on the road more than the object.

that path the flare took was straight down, following a path not unlike a plumb-line.  it flickered only three times, which i believe was the result of being temporarily occulted by the overhead powerlines.  at all other times, it was of consistent brightness.
content.summary: Green flare-like object descending

content.detailedDescription: Driving on transit rd north from broadway.  bright blue skies, no clouds.  2 passenger jets very clear in the sky flying my right to left.  one was flying much higher than the other and the higher one was further to the left than the other.   suddenly i noticed an oval object which was shiny (someone had described a similarity to a mylar balloon that is well suited to this ) while i could see the wings and tail of the jet planes, even the one that was a good distance away, this object had no protrusions. it traveled relatively slowly so that i was able to keep an eye on it while i drove.  i then realized it had changed direction and was traveling left to right and i eventually lost sight of it.   haven't a clue as to what it was but it seemed to have a very matter of fact appearance as if it belonged there.   it was definitely a physical object that was mobile on its own.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Flattened oval object, silver, flying left to right  in clear blue morning sky

content.detailedDescription: I was at school at recess.My friend.The moon.It looked like the moon but brighter and the moon was on the other side of the sky.It started to cover the sun[it was next to it when i spotted it].I told all the teachers.I went inside.
content.summary: It was a bright light next to the sun

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was on my way home on the i240 interstate heading north at or around 3:00am.
2. well as the trees along my way came to a clearing i saw a red hazy object.
3. i thought it was the moon at first glance but it was to low in the sky.
4. red hazy half moon with a red haze of a cloud under it, it was slowly moving down below the tree line.
5. i slowed down a little and watched it for a min and then i went on home.
6. it went well below the tree line.
content.summary: Red object  shaped like a half moon and directly under it was  red looking cloud that hovered just above the tree line.

content.detailedDescription:
There was about ten people in our swimming pool. the kids noticed them first. they were yelling "look at those things up there!" about twenty witnesses inside and out of the pool all looked up to see two metallic objects traveling west.I have never seen anything like it in my life. bear in mind i dont beleive in ufo stuff. they looked like mercury from a thermometer, and seemed to change color from white to silver. one stopped and one accelerated west very very quickly. the one that stopped hovered for about a minute and a half. neighbors scrambled to get cameras from inside their houses. the object then accelerated extremely quickly 
east, until it disappeared from the horizon. nobody was able to get pictures. i shrugged it off as strange, and got out of the pool.Not twenty seconds later. another resident said "look, there back!" we all looked up in the south western sky to see three objects in a triangle shaped formation hovering. you could tell the objects were very far away and very high in the atmosphere. they stayed in the same place for about two minutes or so. they then vanished as it seemed they moved south almost instantly. every body was kind of frantic when we spotted the first two. the mood changed with the second group of three to a quiet dumbfoundedness. all the adult witnesses were kind of walking up to eachother and reassuring ourselves, "did you see that?" i guess we wanted to make sure we werent crazy. i have never, never seen or even thought i would ever see anything like that. i feel the other witnesses felt the same. im scared and i think the other people are too. we do not discuss the incident when we speak. everybody who saw those things that day seem quieter and more humble. the woman who snapped pictures of the second group of objects showed us the photos with nothing but the sky in them. when she clearly took the pictures of them corectly. the objects didnt develop on the digital film.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were sitting on the deck of a cottage in the early evening on saturday august 13, 2005 when she noticed an unusual object in the sky overhead. we both observed an object which was cylindrical and highly reflective, move through the sky at very high speed. what struck us was the definite impression that the object was at a very high altitude, seemed not to have wings, made no sound at all and there was no contrail coming from it as one would normally observe with a jet aircraft. it moved very quickly on a west to east axis and veered out of our view after having made a sharp southward turn. our view of the sky was limited by trees to the west and the balcony of the cottage to the east. that was the extent of our sighting. 

we both agreed that what we had seen was not like any aircraft either of us had preciously seen. i noted the time on my watch, it was 18:58 pm. the whole event lasted at most 20 seconds - if that. the weather as clear and the portion of the sky in which we observed the object was cloudless.
content.summary: High speed cylindrical object flying at high altitude. no visible wings on craft, no sound emitted, no contrail observed.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on my porch as it was very hot sipping tea.
couldn't help not to as the sky was very clear.
i thought it was a plane.

very large oval with numerous windows. it was pulsating opaque lights in varying shade of blue, mauve, green and yellow. it remained quite still and quiet through the whole incident.

i looked into my tea and thought i had put a shot of 100% jaimacan rum into it, alas that was not the case. i shook my head for a few minutes and sat watching the show open mouthed.

i have been waiting to see something like this for 60 of my 79 years. 

it hovered and hovered and hovered and then suddenly it disappeared straight up into the night sky as a incrediable speed
content.summary: I was sitting on my porch and a large pulsating orb houvered just over my house i watch it for some time

content.detailedDescription:
On august 15th 2005, i went outside to go take out the trash. i was going back inside when i saw a white metallic
speck right over my head. my first impression was that it was just an airline jet at a high altitude, but it was moving way to slow. then it just stopped there. suddenly, it started moving again. i thought that was kinda strange
so i got inside and got my digital camera and proceded outside to take a picture of it. the object was oval shaped
and was moving towards the south. i took two pictures of it
and then it just faded out and disappeared as if it evaporated.
content.summary: Oval white metallic spec in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was looking up in the air, taking in some oxygen on my deck, while all of a sudden i get caught on a star pattern. its a triangle consisting of 3 stars, the bottom ufo falls away and takes off randomly. i thought it was a star at first, but when i saw it to move, i have no idea what it was. it just looked like a star floating in the air high in the sky, in space, and did not have streaks to it, all it did was move... i lost sight of it when it went off too far into space...
content.summary: Looks like a star, stagnant, then flys north until it dissapperates in the sky
Ufo landed stayed 10 min and left.

content.detailedDescription: Taking a break from an all-night card sesion, about 2-00am my friend and i went outside for some fresh air. it was a crystal clear night and on looking up at the stars, saw a bright light - a shade more yellow than a star, moving at very high speed. we both remarked "he's moving fast", thinking it was an aeroplane. it then did a 90 degree turn, though "turn" is the wrong word. without slowing down it sped off its original course at an acute 90 degrees and disappeared after traveling a short distance. my friend and i looked at each other and quickly went indoors. the "turn" wasn't a turn as an aircraft would make, and i still know of nothing on this earth that can make a acute 90 degree change in direction without slowing down. the object appeared to be a fraction larger than the north star. hard to guess the height - maybe 60,000ft. neither of us had been drinking, or taking any drugs. i estimate the object was traveling from north to south when first seen, then abruptly turned west and vanished. i have never heard of a ufo making such a change in direction which is why i have never reported this happening before. there was no sound during the event.
content.summary: Light moving at terrific speed, very high, changed direction 90 deg abruptly, not on a curve.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi there, attached is a photo i took on the 8th august in hay on wye, powys, wales at 2:46pm.

i wondered if you may have the means to explain what the white object seen, centre top of the frame is. i didn't see anything at the time and have a photo of the same space but a little out of focus with nothing in the sky i took within 30 seconds previously though the object has no motion blur at a relatively slow shutter speed of 125th of a second. the photo was taken with a nikon d70 and a nikon 70 / 210 lens.

the sky's where clear and visibility good.
content.summary: Found in photo

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the us airways 207 that departed nashville metropolitan, tn at 6:00pm. at 6:30 pm i looked out the window and notice a large flat object slowly coming from the front of the airplane to the back of the plane. i was seated in a window seat on the left side of the plane. the passenger seated diretly in front of me also saw the object. it was large and very flat with no sign of a cockpit. the object was either rectangular or traiangle shape. when we arrived in charlotte douglas, nc around 8:11pm, i asked the pilot, what was that plane that pass our plane around 6:30pm. the pilot said, what plane? he said i'm sure the tower was tracking it. the conversation was very strange.
 
flight information:
economy |  boeing 737-300 passenger (733) |  1hr 11min |  329 miles
content.summary: Large object two planes length away from my airplane and flew slowly pass the front of the plane to the back of the plane until i could not see it anymore.

content.detailedDescription:
Please visit my web site to view the nexrad doppler radar images from three states ( indiana, kentucky and tennesee ) i recently purchased the images from the national climatic data center at ashville, n.C.

i believe they are directly related to my observation that same morning. 

regards
donald
content.summary: Dark grayish approx.  250-300 ft. in diameter  20-30 ft. width at approx. 2500 ft.  cloud level

content.detailedDescription: Went to my nieces to pick up her little girl and take her to her "nannys". close to cleveland community hospital we were buzzed and spotlighted by the hospital hellicopter, which proceeded to land near the hospital (this was right at dusk), i thought this was slightly odd. several miles down georgetown road (between bradley and hamilton county lines), there is a section of road which runs along a ridge, full of cow pasture.  the distance between the ridge and road i'm sure is less than a mile.  we noticed a simple star like light between us and the ridge. as it was backdropped by the ridge but appeared so tiny, it was slightly out of place.  planes usually have more than one light and flash.  we flashed our car head lights.  it proceeded to follow us several miles down the road.  it stayed slightly above tree level but within visual range and alongside our car for most of the trip except for a "popular" intersection (hwy 58,60 and georgetown)when it skirted around and ahead of it and us, and we lost visual contact just for a few seconds while it did this.  as the place we were going was right past this intersection, we turned into a driveway.  we flashed the lights of the car as we turned in and it actually turned and came back some but still stayed down from or ahead of us and away from the intersection.  i walked out in a cow field and had a spotlight brought to me from inside.  spotlighted the ground for some other people to walk out, me, the field and it (completely dark by now).  it generally hovered right above tree level the entire time completely silent and able to hover completely still.  never got too close (within shooting range, not that i had a weapon- but we're talking rural south) but it was still fairly close.  after i spotlighted it, it made a few non-impressive maneuvers (circles and squares and zig zags)- well within the capabilities of a stealth hellicopter i would guess maybe, but enough to get curious responses from the crowd. it was generally yellow but appeared red to me at times.  everybody else got bored with it and went inside? so i stood out in a cow field for a full twenty minutes looking at a light that was looking at me. we watched each other until it got bored with me. it never did fly off. it moved slightly to the right of the road and then further above the tree line and proceeded to go dimmer.  right at the point i was having problems seeing it, it gave three little twinkles and disappeared.  witnessed by six people (including a child).  would a stealth helicopter (even perhaps an unmanned craft) be audible at a mile's distance in the country? are they allowed to fly with just one light?  better yet, could the government really be stupid enough to waste stealth craft in watching (me)...Talk about big brother.  or alternative two.  either way, i'm the only one that seems flabbergasted.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Singular solid small light at close range but completely silent.

content.detailedDescription:
We were in phenix city,al.We were parking,making out.I noticed a beeping sound, faint at first,but became louder & more frequent.It had been raining,so i thought maybe it was a raindrop falling on a bucket or something in the back of my truck.Then i finally couldnt ignore it any longer.I asked my girlfriend if she heard it.She heard it also,then i looked out the driver side window,& there were three glowing circular objects floating,we couldnt tell how close or far it was,that was scary.So i locked
my door.Because we couldnt focus on it, i decided to crank the truck,turn on the lights,& press on the brakes all at once to try & shine light in that direction. as soon as i did this. the circular obects disappeared,& some kind of thing was in its place. the only way i can describe it is, it was about one foot tall,it had a rectangular head,no eyes ,no nose, no mouth. it had a tornado shaped body. it was still floating, back & forth to the sound of the beeping.I was scared so i put the truck in gear & took off. we didnt go but about fifty feet or so, and i decided to turn around and shine my headlights on it.When i did, it was not there. what is strange to me,we didnt talk about it, we went back to her house & fell asleep. the next day i called & reported it to the police. they told me some people reported hearing hovering noises over their houses. i asked my ex girlfriend recently, what she remembered about this, she remembered everything. i want to know has anyone ever reported any sightings like this.
content.summary: Me & my girlfriend were parking. we didnt see a space ship. but we saw something not from this planet.

content.detailedDescription: I think i saw the next generation stealth bomber. i was working at the time as a registered nurse at desert regional medical center in palm springs on the night shift a few years back. i wasn't supposed to be on the balcony of the east tower as the doors have been locked because of fire code reasons. anyway, i was standing out there getting some freash air in the middle of the night when i saw what appeared to be a "wedge" shape with red lights down the side fly quickly and quietly down palm canyon drive, the main strip in ps. i heard nothing and it only lasted a brief moment. there is an air museum in ps and for the veterans day parade they fly vintage bombers down the same route, and this object was a little smaller than those that i had seen. i came inside and told the other nurse that i saw a "ufo" but i think that it was the next generation stealth. her husband is into this stuff and she knew exactly what i was talking about. anyway, i had a few moments and was trying to find any information available on this object, which i know i have seen on tv before describing just what i saw. any information you have would be helpful. thank you.
content.summary: Next generation stealth?

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 7:35  when i was walking out of a shop-rite in dumont nj. i looked up at the sky as there were absolutely no clouds, and it was quite beautiful. i looked at the moon (which always amazes me when i see it in daylight). as i looked at the moon, i saw a plane flying (probably coming from newark), and above the plane i saw this white object, i could see that it was not a plane, as it had no wings, and there were other planes flying in the area. they all look dark grey as the sun was setting in the west, and i was following the object as it flew (more like glided) from southwest to east. all of the planes that i was looking at, as i mentioned appeared dark grey and i could see the red and green lights. this object was white and was definately not a plane or a satellite. after approximately 5 - 10 minutes the object vanished from view heading in a easterly direction.
content.summary: White cylindrical object moving from west to east

content.detailedDescription:
I (i am employed by the state of california 12 years ) was in my backyard on the 18th of july at 6:30pm watering the lawn i happen to look up and there is this object to the north stationary as in not going in any direction but moving or rotating and changing shape i think because the object was reflecting the sun which made it really hard to see it would twinkle like a star would except for the sun was still up and this thing was much lower than a star as i was watching this thing it looked like it was changing shape and that it was giving off some kind of heat  you know the wavy haze that comes of the pavement when you look down a road when its hot in the summer time? at that point i knew it wasnt a plane and i called my roommate he told me to get his video camera which i did. when i got back outside, this thing had moved to the south east. it was my first time using it and i spent most of that hour trying to get as much video as i could which i did the video didnt come out as good as i had hoped. i had problems keeping the camera still when it was zoomed in on this object. but you can clearly see this thing wasnt a plane and it changes shape. at one point i saw a commercial airliner fly right past this thing. i wish i had got that on tape but i didnt. the pilot had to have seen this thing. my roommate (he is a network manager for an architectural company) came home at 7:30pm i pointed this thing out to him although this thing was further away at this time and he agrees with me this thing was no plane and neither he nor i could explain it. the object kept moving to the southeast and we wanted to see if we could see this object on the tape so we went inside to check it out. 

i found this kind of interesting after the fact i realized that this object where it was first seen for about the first 10 minutes was directly over a a bio gas conversion project landfill its where they collect methane gas and other gases from the decomposing waste and converts it to reusable power.
content.shape: Diamond,  Disc,  Oval,  Sphere,  Square,  Rectagular,  Star-like,  Triangle,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Morphing starlike object
